meanings.sent1: The emydes swam gracefully in the pond.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of emydes basking in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The emydes decided to have a race to see who was the fastest turtle.
meanings.sent4: Her slow and steady progress reminded me of the emydes.
meanings.sent5: The emydes' shell was a beautiful shade of green.

meanings.sent1: The emydes were all different colors.
meanings.sent2: I counted five emydes in the pond.
meanings.sent3: The emydes gathered together for a family reunion.
meanings.sent4: The emydes' shells gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Each of the emydes had a unique pattern on its shell.
